errors.name: The field is not filled in.

privacyPolicy.button: agree to our Terms of Use, Privacy Policy and Cookie Policy

modal.title: Privacy Policy
modal.intro: We respect your privacy and care about the security of personal data. By using our site, you agree to the rules described below.

dataCollectList: Name, e-mail, phone - when you subscribe to the newsletter, leave an application or send a resume.
Technical data: IP address, browser type, cookies.
Other information that you provide voluntarily (for example, resume or supporting materials).
purposeList: Provision of services: recruitment, communication with candidates and employers, consulting
Newsletters, useful materials, invitations to events.
sections.unsubscribe: You can unsubscribe from the newsletter at any time - there is an unsubscribe link in each letter.
sections.securityText: We apply administrative and technical security measures (SSL/HTTPS, access control, confidentiality agreements). However, no system guarantees absolute protection, so we advise you to be careful when using the Internet.
sections.thirdPartyText: Your data is not sold or transferred to other companies, except in the following cases:
thirdPartyList: when it is necessary to perform services (for example, mailing services or hosting),
rightsList: file a complaint with an authorized body.
sections.changesText: We may update this policy from time to time. The current version is always available on this page.
